Name: Industrial ESP32-S3 Gateway Module
Description: DIN-rail mountable gateway core. Features RS485 (Modbus) and CAN bus interface. Designed for industrial automation retrofits.

Name: STM32H7 DSP Breakout Board
Description: High-density breakout for STM32H7. 4-Layer impedance controlled design for signal integrity testing.

Name: BLE 5.2 Sensor Node (Reference Design)
Description: Low-power sensor node reference. nRF52832 based. Schematics available upon request.
